name: PARCA Thrift Shop
description: Accepts donations of clothing, housewares, small furniture, and collectibles; proceeds support adults with developmental disabilities; pickup available for large items
fullDescription: PARCA Thrift Shop accepts donations and operates a thrift store with proceeds supporting programs for adults with developmental disabilities in San Mateo County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing donations
- Accept housewares and furniture
- Accept collectibles
- Pickup available for large items
- Affordable thrift shopping
- Proceeds support adults with disabilities
howToGetIt:
1. Visit PARCA Thrift Shop
2. Donate gently used items
3. Schedule pickup for large items
4. Or shop for affordable goods
5. Support disability programs
6. Get donation receipt
address: 1101 El Camino Real, San Bruno, CA 94066
keywords: PARCA, thrift shop, San Bruno, donate clothes, donate furniture, developmental disabilities, charity shop, secondhand, clothing donation, pickup service
